notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: HX, ZZ, HL, TT, YW and LQ were involved in the initial conception of the study, its design, conduct and data acquisition. MC and PO further refined the study design. HX, MC, and PO analyzed and interpreted the data and wrote the first draft of the manuscript. All authors critically reviewed the drafts of the manuscript, approved the final version and agree to be accountable by it.
